description: This file defines a Subnet class for managing AWS EC2 subnets, including methods to retrieve availability zone and VPC ID, and a utility function to get VPC ID from a list of subnet IDs.

classes.name: Subnet
classes.description: Represents an AWS EC2 subnet with methods to retrieve its availability zone and VPC ID.

methods.name: get_availability_zone
methods.description: Retrieves the availability zone of the subnet using AWS API.

methods.name: get_vpc_id
methods.description: Retrieves the VPC ID associated with the subnet.

methods.name: get_vpc_id_from_subnet_ids
methods.description: Utility function to get the VPC ID from a list of subnet IDs, ensuring all subnets are in the same VPC.
